messages.title: BRADFORD GOES GREEN
messages.content: On the 7th May, everyone in Bradford District will have the chance to vote for a different kind of politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make welfare fairer to protect the most vulnerable in society.
Make the top 1% and big business pay their fair share of tax.
Stop the privatisation of the NHS and reverse the cuts.
Build truly affordable housing for all.
Tackle climate change and invest in renewable energy.

issues.environment: Our reckless consumerism is environmentally damaging and unsustainable.
issues.governance: The Green Party believes the politics of the future doesnâ€™t have to look like the politics of the past.

housing.content: Build truly affordable housing for all.

images.caption: A special bulletin for the General and Local Elections in May 2015
